channel.title: personal on Willem's Portfolio
channel.description: Recent content in personal on Willem's Portfolio

item.title: Homelab
item.description: Category Details Subject Personal homelab server Who Willem De Bie What A Raspberry Pi-based server hosting various services (DietPi OS) Where My home Why To learn, experiment and self-host services. Realizations I use my Raspberry Pi 4 to self-host a number of different software applications. 1. My Discord bot My Discord bot written in Python is hosted on this homelab so that it runs 24/7 and everyone can always use it.

item.title: Racu
item.description: Category Details Subject My Discord bot: Racu Who Willem De Bie What A Discord bot with mini-games, a leveling system, administration, … Where Discord, and the docs wiki Why To learn Python and the MariaDB database server. Realizations Discord Bot A Discord bot is an automated program that operates within the Discord platform. It can perform a variety of tasks, from moderating a server to playing music, and much more.
